query: SELECT date_trunc_ym(data_as_of) AS month, city, COUNT(*) AS count WHERE data_as_of >= '2022-09-01' GROUP BY city, month ORDER BY month, city

data_as_of.description: Timestamp data was updated in the source system

city.description: City where the contractor firm is located

table_metadata.title: Plumbing Permits Contacts
table_metadata.description: Contacts of contractors for Plumbing Permits
